before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"8m0pt","text":"Filtration and preservation of the water samples through Sterivex units","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":71}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1ta7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5dn2","text":"This procedure can be performed with Sterivex filter units prefilled with preservation buffer (e.g. C1 buffer) or not. If the Sterivex is not prefilled with buffer, it should be frozen immediately after water filtration and until DNA extraction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2p45t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ceb1f","text":"Note: If Sterivex are preserved with C1 buffer or the preservation buffer from the protocol below, the extraction can be performed directly, but for other preservation buffers such as Longmire and CTAB, the protocol proposed here will work, but upstream precipitation is recommended to increase the extraction efficiency.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":48},{"style":"italic","offset":97,"length":119},{"style":"italic","offset":230,"length":91}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ije4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6oa33","text":"The following protocol can be used to filter water through the Sterivex and to preserve them with a preservation buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38hp8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"adt2g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eet0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tao6","text":"The following precautions must be applied:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m00l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kb1a","text":"- Wear gloves throughout the extraction process","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0p1","text":"- Clean the bench with a DNA-removing solution (e.g. DNA-off, DNA away).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3l9pu","text":"- Use tips with filters to avoid contaminations","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aksh9","text":"- All steps have to be performed under a specific DNA-work station (sterile area equipped with air filtration and UV systems)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"anm5v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca4bs","text":"For any manipulation in a rare DNA room, provide complete equipment (disposable coat, cap, mask, shoe covers \u0026 gloves).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":119}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32lar","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2iohq","text":"Pre and post extraction equipment decontamination:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bdq1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ep1qm","text":"      - Clean a specific DNA work station and apply UV","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6b1kc","text":"      - MagnetaPure 32 System (Dutscher): Visual check for residues to be removed and UV decontamination – see instrument manual ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":107,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ciird","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":46993,"title":"Fish description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1bfjk","text":"The objective of this protocol is the environmental DNA (eDNA) extraction from water samples filtered through Sterivex filter units. The Sterivex units can be prefilled with preservation buffer or not.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":38,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":52,"length":81}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"853k0","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lrj6","text":"DNA extraction is performed using a MagnetaPure 32 Nucleic Acid Purification System (Dutscher) and with the NucleoMagDNA/RNA Water Kit (Macherey Nagel). ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":35,"length":49},{"style":"bold","offset":108,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8k9l5","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9i8kv","text":"The procedure is based on reversible adsorption of nucleic acids to paramagnetic beads under appropriate buffer conditions. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":60}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnfb8","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ibnh","text":"The benefits of using the MagnetaPure 32 Nucleic Acid Purification System (Dutscher) are increased productivity and repeatability, as well as eliminating human error and the pain of repetitive work.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":48},{"style":"bold","offset":89,"length":108}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8130i","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au243","text":"This protocol is used prior to molecular biology analysis (e.g. qPCR, metabarcoding, ddPCR) to specifically target both macro- and micro-organisms eDNA extracted from water samples.\n","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":22,"length":35},{"style":"bold","offset":115,"length":66}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qqb","text":"This protocol is optimised for rare eDNA and the suggested elution volumes are therefore low (between 50 and 65 µL), but can be increased if targets are more abundant.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":40},{"style":"bold","offset":59,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"22fqv","text":"The main steps of the protocol are:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12cpp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7m50v","text":"Material preparation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6og2f","text":"Plate preparation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9osgu","text":"Sample lysis","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ihqs","text":"Extraction with the MagnetaPure 32 System (Dutscher)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4l1i","text":"DNA elution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9807j","text":"Materials:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":10},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"278cu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf0f7","text":"- 1000 µL pipette ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df944","text":"- 100 µL pipette  ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vek","text":"- Vortex + benchtop centrifuge","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fgv8u","text":"- Horizontal vortex with holder for Sterivex (15 mL tube holders)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drtls","text":"- Centrifuge for 2 mL tubes (relative centrifugal force needed: 11,000 x g)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"817ed","text":"- Incubator (temperature needed: 70°C)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10ehb","text":"- MagnetaPure 32 Nucleic Acid Purification System (Dutscher) ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc9ae","text":"- Specific DNA-workstation (sterile area equipped with air filtration and UV systems) ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a51q4","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ej0m","text":"Consumables:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":12},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1k4a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5p3kf","text":"All tubes and tips must be sterile","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vse9","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lldg","text":"- 1000 µL tips with filter","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"30tjs","text":"- 100 µL tips with filter","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dv629","text":"- 50 mL tubes: to prepare aliquots","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"691dh","text":"- 5 mL tubes: 1 per 8 samples to prepare NucleoMag B-Beads and MWA2 mix","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5s16","text":"- 2 mL tubes: 1 per sample to transfer lysate + 2 to prepare aliquots","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"br4ca","text":"- 1.5 mL tubes: 1 per sample to transfer eluted DNA","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fl7g","text":"- 5 mL syringes with Luer lock tip","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fis83","text":"- 96-well plate with 2 mL deep-wells, U-Bottom (Macherey Nagel - 746032.DEEP): 1 per 16 samples","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jlek","text":"- Magnetic rod coverfor MagnetaPure 32 (Macherey Nagel – 747032.TC): 1 per 8 samples","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m14l","text":"- Plastic film to protect the 96-well plate","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9042v","text":"- Gloves ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ruqf","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nh6c","text":"For any manipulation in a rare DNA room, provide complete equipment (disposable coat, cap, mask, shoe covers \u0026 gloves).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":119}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ouk2","text":" ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc5k0","text":"Reagents: ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":10},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7a9tv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qvho","text":"- NucleoMag DNA/RNA Water kit (Macherey Nagel) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ce3d","text":"                    Note: shelf life of reagents for 24 months from production","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":78}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8v5s7","text":"- Buffer C1 (Macherey Nagel) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38d2a","text":"                     Note: Buffer C1 for lysis of Sterivex filtered samples is not supplied in the kit and must be ordered separately from the supplier (900 µL per sample)        ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":1,"length":176}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7fjlg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pevu","text":"Samples Sterivex filter units prefilled with preservation buffer (e.g. C1) or {"blocks":[{"key":"a9ias","text":"In this step, the buffers provided by the kit are distributed in a 96-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":81}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ak1f3","text":"For DNA extraction from filtered water samples, the 12 columns of the plate are divided into 2 sections of 6 columns each, allowing up to 16 samples to be extracted per
